patterns.pattern: ^You ask (.*) for a quest\.$
^You are on a quest to (slay|recover|spar with) (?<target>.*) in in (the vicinity of )?(?<room>.*) of (?<area>The Forest of Ancient Guardians)\.$
^You are on a quest to (slay|recover|spar with) (?<target>.*) in in (the vicinity of )?(?<room>.*) of (?<area>Town of Bandell)\.$
^You are on a quest to (slay|recover|spar with) (?<target>.*) in (the vicinity of )?(?<room>.*) of (?<area>Tree of Pixies II)\.$
^You are on a quest to (slay|recover|spar with) (?<target>.*) in (the vicinity of )?(?<room>.*) of (?<area>High Tower of Sorcery)\.$
^You are on a quest to (slay|recover|spar with) (?<target>.*) in (the vicinity of )?(?<room>.*) of (?<area>Jungle of Xyzzyxx)\.$
^You are on a quest to (slay|recover|spar with) (?<target>.*) in (the vicinity of )?(?<room>.*) of (?<area>Avenue of the Ancients Highway)\.$
^You are on a quest to (slay|recover|spar with) (?<target>.*) in (the vicinity of )?(?<room>.*) of (?<area>City of Illyria)\.$
^You are on a quest to (slay|recover|spar with) (?<target>.*) in (the vicinity of )?(?<room>.*) of (?<area>Field of Dreams Highway)\.$
^You are on a quest to (slay|recover|spar with) (?<target>.*) in (the vicinity of )?(?<room>.*) of (?<area>Realms of Enchantment)\.$
^You are on a quest to (slay|recover|spar with) (?<target>.*) in (the vicinity of )?(?<room>.*) of (?<area>Land of the Lost Elves)\.$
^You are on a quest to (slay|recover|spar with) (?<target>.*) in (the vicinity of )?(?<room>.*) of (?<area>Isle of the Dead)\.$
^You are on a quest to (slay|recover|spar with) (?<target>.*) in (the vicinity of )?(?<room>.*) of (?<area>Chasm of Mayhem Highway)\.$
^You are on a quest to (slay|recover|spar with) (?<target>.*) in (the vicinity of )?(?<room>.*) of (?<area>Castle of Darkness)\.$
^You are on a quest to (slay|recover|spar with) (?<target>.*) in (the vicinity of )?(?<room>.*) of (?<area>City of Tanaria)\.$
^You are on a quest to (slay|recover|spar with) (?<target>.*) in (the vicinity of )?(?<room>.*) of (?<area>Paths to Ancient Legends Highway)\.$
^You are on a quest to (slay|recover|spar with) (?<target>.*) in (the vicinity of )?(?<room>.*) of (?<area>Kextra\'s Legendary Land of Myth)\.$
^You are on a quest to (slay|recover|spar with) (?<target>.*) in (the vicinity of )?(?<room>.*) of (?<area>Jungle of Artemisia)\.$
^You are on a quest to (slay|recover|spar with) (?<target>.*) in (the vicinity of )?(?<room>.*) of (?<area>Tree of Pixies)\.$
^You are on a quest to (slay|recover|spar with) (?<target>.*) in (the vicinity of )?(?<room>.*) of (?<area>.*)\.$
^Finish the quest in under (?<min>\d+) (minutes|minute) and (?<sec>\d+) seconds for a bonus reward\.$
^You inform (.*) you have completed your quest\.$
^You shamefully fail your quest
